nodes.text: The mountain poacher bunker was used by the mountain poachers as their base of operations at the time of the Galactic Civil War. The building was located close to the Zaprin Estate, at the foot of the Gallo Mountains, near the edge of the Lianorm Swamp Naboo's Gallo Mountains, many kilometers southeast of the Lake Retreat.

Most of the bunker was built underground. Only the small top level with the only entrance to the bunker was visible above ground. The two underground levels featured several rooms, used for various purposes. Several computer terminals were in use by the poachers. The biggest room on the lowest floor was used as a dining-hall.
Trained narglatchs were allowed to roam freely inside the bunker.

The Mountain poacher bunker appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. In the game, the bunker was only officially titled as the Occupied Bunker.
